item.title: The Business of Esports: How Competitive Gaming Became a Billion-Dollar Industry
item.description: Exploring the business models and economics behind the explosive growth of esports.

item.title: Streamer 'NinjaX' Breaks World Record for Solo Kills
item.description: In a stunning display of skill, the popular streamer managed to wipe out nearly half the lobby in a single match.
